markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Arctic](/Rules.aspx?ID=595)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 512 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The main challenge in an arctic environment is the low temperature, but arctic environments also contain ice and snow. The disasters that most often strike in arctic environments are avalanches, blizzards, and floods.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<document level="2" id="rules-596" />

<document level="2" id="rules-597" />
name: Arctic
